segments.text: I have a complaint to make . The bill you sent me was incorrect . What's more , it isn't the first time
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I must apologize , madam . We have new computers here , you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't you think it's about time you got them working properly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree entirely . I assure you it won't happen again .
segments.speaker: S2
